expansioncontent:ChargeUp.NAME: Charge Up
expansioncontent:ChargeUp.DESCRIPTION: *Boss - Guardian. NL On your next turn, gain !B! Block and !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:GuardianWhirl.NAME: Guardian Whirl
expansioncontent:GuardianWhirl.DESCRIPTION: *Boss - Guardian. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies 4 times. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:DefensiveMode.NAME: Defensive Mode
expansioncontent:DefensiveMode.DESCRIPTION: *Boss - Guardian. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Enter guardianmod:Defensive_Mode.

expansioncontent:Hexaburn.NAME: Ghost Inferno
expansioncontent:Hexaburn.DESCRIPTION: *Boss - Hexaghost. NL Lose 6 HP. NL Deal !D! damage a random enemy 6 times. NL Exhaust.
expansioncontent:Hexaburn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: *Boss - Hexaghost. NL Deal !D! damage a random enemy 6 times. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:Sear.NAME: Greater Sear
expansioncontent:Sear.DESCRIPTION: *Boss - Hexaghost. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! hexamod:Soulburn. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:SuperHexaguard.NAME: Ghost Guard
expansioncontent:SuperHexaguard.DESCRIPTION: *Boss - Hexaghost. Ethereal. hexamod:Afterlife. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 card.

expansioncontent:HyperBeam.NAME: Automa-Beam
expansioncontent:HyperBeam.DESCRIPTION: *Boss - Automaton. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL At the start of your next turn, lose [E]. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:Flail.NAME: Flail
expansioncontent:Flail.DESCRIPTION: *Boss - Automaton. NL Deal !D! damage twice to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:BronzeBeam.NAME: Orb Support
expansioncontent:BronzeBeam.DESCRIPTION: *Boss - Automaton. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:DefensiveStance.NAME: Defensive Stance
expansioncontent:DefensiveStance.DESCRIPTION: *Boss - Champ. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Block at the end of each turn.

expansioncontent:FaceSlap.NAME: Face Slap
expansioncontent:FaceSlap.DESCRIPTION: *Boss - Champ. NL Remove all Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:LastStand.NAME: Last Stand
expansioncontent:LastStand.DESCRIPTION: *Boss - Champ. NL Remove all Debuffs. NL Gain 1 Strength. NL If you are below half HP, Gain 2 Strength.
expansioncontent:LastStand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: *Boss - Champ. NL Remove all Debuffs. NL Gain 1 Strength. NL If you are below half HP, Heal !M! and gain 2 Strength.

expansioncontent:Collect.NAME: Collect
expansioncontent:Collect.DESCRIPTION: *Boss - Collector. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 1 Strength. NL Gain 1 Dexterity.

expansioncontent:YouAreMine.NAME: YOU ARE MINE!
expansioncontent:YouAreMine.DESCRIPTION: *Boss - Collector. NL Remove all Block, apply !M! Weak and apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:Torchfire.NAME: Torchfire
expansioncontent:Torchfire.DESCRIPTION: *Boss - Collector. NL Deal !D! damage. Damage is increased by !M! for each Debuff on the enemy. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:CaCaw.NAME: CA-CAW!
expansioncontent:CaCaw.DESCRIPTION: *Boss - Awakened One. NL Gain !M! Strength at the start of each turn.

expansioncontent:DarkVoid.NAME: Dark Void
expansioncontent:DarkVoid.DESCRIPTION: *Boss - Awakened One. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. The next time each enemy does not Attack on their turn, gain 1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:AwakenDeath.NAME: Awaken
expansioncontent:AwakenDeath.DESCRIPTION: *Boss - Awakened One. NL When you would die, heal !M! HP instead.

expansioncontent:TimeRipple.NAME: Time Ripple
expansioncontent:TimeRipple.DESCRIPTION: *Boss - Time Eater. NL Deal !D! damage and apply Slow to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:Chronoboost.NAME: Chrono-Boost
expansioncontent:Chronoboost.DESCRIPTION: *Boss - Time Eater. NL Gain 2 Strength for every 12th card you play.
expansioncontent:Chronoboost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: *Boss - Time Eater. NL Gain 2 Strength for every 9th card you play.

expansioncontent:ManipulateTime.NAME: Manipulate Time
expansioncontent:ManipulateTime.DESCRIPTION: *Boss - Time Eater. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Trigger all effects that happen at the start of your turn. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:DonusPower.NAME: Donu's Power
expansioncontent:DonusPower.DESCRIPTION: *Boss - Ancients. NL Gain 1 Strength. NL Add a random Attack card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
expansioncontent:DonusPower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength and 1 Artifact. NL Add a random Attack card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:DecasProtection.NAME: Deca's Protection
expansioncontent:DecasProtection.DESCRIPTION: *Boss - Ancients. NL Gain 1 Dexterity. NL Add a random Power card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
expansioncontent:DecasProtection.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Dexterity and 1 Artifact. NL Add a random Power card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:PolyBeam.NAME: Twin Beam
expansioncontent:PolyBeam.DESCRIPTION: *Boss - Ancients. NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL Deal !D! damage twice at the start of your next turn. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:PrepareCrush.NAME: Prepare Crush
expansioncontent:PrepareCrush.DESCRIPTION: *Boss - Slime. NL Gain !B! Block. NL On your next turn, gain [E] [E] [E] and add SLIME CRUSH to your hand. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:GoopSpray.NAME: Goop Spray
expansioncontent:GoopSpray.DESCRIPTION: *Boss - Slime. NL Apply !M! slimeboundmod:Goop and 2 Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
expansioncontent:GoopSpray.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: *Boss - Slime. NL Apply !M! Goop and 3 Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:SlimeTackle.NAME: Slime Tackle
expansioncontent:SlimeTackle.DESCRIPTION: *Boss - Slime. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Take 3 damage. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:StudyTheSpire.NAME: Study the Spire
expansioncontent:StudyTheSpire.DESCRIPTION: Add a random *Boss card to your hand at the start of your next !M! turns. It costs 0 until played.
expansioncontent:StudyTheSpire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a random Upgraded *Boss card to your hand at the start of your next !M! turns. It costs 0 until played.

expansioncontent:QuickStudy.NAME: Quick Study
expansioncontent:QuickStudy.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 Bosses. NL Gain a copy of each of its *Boss cards. NL They cost 0 until played. NL Exhaust.
expansioncontent:QuickStudy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 Bosses. NL Gain an Upgraded copy of each of its *Boss cards. NL They cost 0 until played. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:DashGenerateEvil.NAME: The Evil Within
expansioncontent:DashGenerateEvil.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add a random *Boss to your hand. It costs 0 until played. NL Exhaust.
expansioncontent:DashGenerateEvil.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add a random Upgraded *Boss to your hand. It costs 0 until played. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:Corrupt.NAME: Corrupt
expansioncontent:Corrupt.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 card. Replace it with a random *Boss card that costs 1 less. NL Exhaust.
expansioncontent:Corrupt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 card. Replace it with a random Upgraded *Boss card that costs 1 less. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:KnowingSkullWish.NAME: KnowingSkull
expansioncontent:KnowingSkullWish.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Spend HP to Wish for Souls, Success, or a Pick Me Up. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:ShieldSmash.NAME: Armor Break
expansioncontent:ShieldSmash.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Remove all Block from the enemy. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:Antidote.NAME: Antidote
expansioncontent:Antidote.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Lose all Poison. NL Poison does not bypass Block, happens at END of turn, and loses half its stack. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:Debug.NAME: Corrupt Core
expansioncontent:Debug.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Remove all enemy Orbs. NL Exhaust.

expansioncontent:PeaceOut.NAME: Dark Whisper
expansioncontent:PeaceOut.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Enemy leaves their Stance. NL Remove all Mantra from the enemy. NL Exhaust.
